snippet: After Dustin Johnson took a leave of absence from golf, the PGA Tour was mostly silent about the news, casting a spotlight on the opacity of the tour’s drug policy.
abstract: Karen Crouse On Golf column observes that Dustin Johnson's abrupt departure from PGA Tour for personal reasons is casting spotlight on Tour's opaque drug policy; notes reports of Johnson's hard-partying lifestyle, including one saying he was suspended for failed drug test involving cocaine; argues that Tour's refusal to disclose testing and suspension details casts suspicion over all absences, and invites speculation.
lead_paragraph: After Dustin Johnson took a leave of absence from golf, the PGA Tour was mostly silent about the news, casting a spotlight on the opacity of the tour’s drug policy.

headline.seo: Dustin Johnson's Leave Raises Questions About PGA Tour Policy
